article_title: Healthcare's Story Of The Year For 2013

article_metadata.description: For many, the disastrous launch of Healthcare.gov (and the public exchanges more broadly) will be the healthcare story of the year. As a single topic, it clearly dominated many of the news cycles for the last full quarter of 2013. My vote, however, is the unfolding story (and stories) around U.S. [...]
